1.content: The forces of light (Talis) and dark are at your disposal, and the third (mercenary) race which can ally with either side or fight for their own race.
1.title: Three sides

11.content:
the forces of Talis split into five sections.

Humans - obvious how they look. they mainly live in areas such as grassland, woodland, and on occasions in the mountains. very versatile when dealing with profession and adapting to their environment to survive.

Dwarves - the stout race of Talis. they live underground, mainly under the mountains of the land. they rely on their superior metal craft to get an edge in their battles

High elves - one of two elven branches in Talis, they like within the forests of Talis. versatile with a blade as well as a bow, they are ready for any threat.

Wood elves - like their high elf cousins, they live within the forests of Talis, mainly living on and above the ground. More proficient with a bow than the other races, they work with nature to overcome their foes.

Aviarus - resemble bird - like versions of humans. they have feathers for hair, have wings on their arms, which allows them to glide for short distances, and have three talons on their feet and five on their hands. they mainly live high in the mountains within monasteries. They mainly train as monks, due to which, they are highly skilled at martial arts and do not tend to get involved with other races, but can choose other ways of fighting and to get involved with the wars of other races.
11.title: Forces of Talis

115.content: Ok, First off, is your Aviarus male or female
115.title: Gender

1151.content: The Aviarus are usually Brought up as monks, so that will be the prime choice. But add in other professions you want to be.
1151.title: male

12.content:
There are mainly four races in the armies of darkness

Orcs - a brutish, merciless race, that live in the barren plains far to the south. these beasts prefer to charge headlong into battle, fighting with crude weapons, mainly close range, and bare knuckles, smashing the life out of anything that stands in their way.

Goblins - sneaky, mischievous, creatures that rely on cheap tricks and underhanded plans to win. often seen working in tribes and war-bands, they share the same barren plains that the orcs inhabit. they often works with orc armies, picking off anything the savage orcs leave behind from a distance.

Dark Elves - evil versions of elves that live in the dark woodlands to the south. their animosity to the elves have left them with dark hearts and rely on deception and trickery to win against their enemies.

Wild men - a feral version of the humans of Talis that live in the same conditions of humans. (see the forces of Talis for details) they use the same weapons, but run wild when they fight instead of in an orderly fashion as humans do.
12.title: Forces of Darkness

13.content:
In Talis, there are three races that live neutrally to the war between light and darkness, or choose to join it.

Raptarian - a race of lizard - people. mainly a nomadic people, they are rarely known to settle in one place for too long. mainly use hit and run tactics but will fight when needed. they live out in the deserts and plains of Talis, and usually make their weapons from either metal, flint or bone.

Luparus - a race of wolf men, which bear a resemblance to werewolves. live within hilly areas. they fight with weapons, but when all else fails, they resort to their fangs, claws and overall bestial nature to tear apart their enemies.

Panterans - a race that is half man and half of a lion, tiger or panther. each kind of Panteran is split into different tribes and live out in the plains of Talis. each rely on their own skills to survive.
lion Panteran - rely on their brute strength, and mainly use close range weapons or their bare knuckles and claws.
Tiger Panteran - rely on their agility and use both long and short range weapons
Panther Panteran - Rely on their stealth and use long range weapons (bows) and daggers
13.title: Neutral/ Mercenary race

131.content: to start off, is your Raptarian Male or female?
131.title: Raptarian - gender

1311.content: the Raptarian are variable when it comes to their profession so we'll star with two simple choices, the warrior and hunter
1311.title: Raptarian - profession

133.content:
before you start choosing which the gender and profession of your character, you should first decide which tribe you're in. here's the three tribes of the Panterans

lion Panteran tribe - rely on their brute strength, and mainly use close range weapons or their bare knuckles and claws.
Tiger Panteran tribe - rely on their agility and use both long and short range weapons
Panther Panteran tribe - Rely on their stealth and use long range weapons (bows) and daggers
133.title: which tribe

info.brief_description: follow the journey of a character in the land of Talis
info.description:
The land of Talis is open to you.
you can choose any race to be and it's class (with a few exceptions), and explore the land as you wish.
not everything will be as easy as it looks however. the races of light and darkness are at war with one another, and it falls to you, the fellow members of your race, and the allied races to triumph in this time of war.

be sure to add some killing, it is a war.
but don't add any sex stuff into it. other than that, Enjoy.
